modmenu.descriptionTranslation.roadarchi: Travel around the world without barriers: RoadArchitect automatically scans your world, finds villages, and other structures, and then lays a network of roads between them.
text.autoconfig.roadarchitect.option.buo: Distance in blocks along water path between buoys.
text.autoconfig.roadarchitect.option.chu: Radius in chunks scanned when new chunks generate.
text.autoconfig.roadarchitect.option.det: Place lamps, buoys and sides using a global marker grid (chunk-agnostic).
text.autoconfig.roadarchitect.option.ini: Radius in blocks to scan for structures when the world is first loaded.
text.autoconfig.roadarchitect.option.lam: Distance in blocks along the path between lamp posts.
text.autoconfig.roadarchitect.option.mas: Symmetric erosion near land/water transitions; excludes E points near edges.
text.autoconfig.roadarchitect.option.max: Maximum distance in blocks between two structures to connect them.
text.autoconfig.roadarchitect.option.pip: Delay in seconds between pipeline runs.
text.autoconfig.roadarchitect.option.sid: Distance in blocks between side decorations along the path.
text.autoconfig.roadarchitect.option.str: List of structure selectors that roads will connect.
text.autoconfig.roadarchitect.title: Road Architect Config
text.config.roadarchitect.option.chunkGe: Radius in chunks scanned when new chunks generate.
text.config.roadarchitect.option.initSca: Radius in blocks to scan for structures when the world is first loaded.
text.config.roadarchitect.option.maxConn: Maximum distance in blocks between two structures to connect them.
text.config.roadarchitect.option.pipelin: Delay in seconds between pipeline runs.
text.config.roadarchitect.option.structu: List of structure selectors that roads will connect.
